name: Doodle God: 8-bit Mania - Collector's Item
description: Every Element & Reaction Have Been Beautifully Redrawn with this amazing 8-bit skin to original Doodle God. If You Loved Doodle God - try this unique version of one of the most original games in the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1024 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I have a Mac, met all requirements, can start it, but not a single window shows up.
